description: This file defines a React context and provider for managing global state related to shipment tracking in a delivery tracker application. It includes state management, API calls, WebSocket and polling for live updates, and notification handling.

methods.name: AppProvider({ children })
methods.description: React component that provides shipment tracking state and actions via context.

methods.name: searchByTracking
methods.description: Fetch shipment data by tracking number and initiate live updates.

methods.name: startLiveUpdates
methods.description: Establish WebSocket connection for real-time shipment updates or fall back to polling.

methods.name: setupPolling
methods.description: Set up periodic polling to fetch shipment updates when WebSocket is unavailable.

methods.name: pushNotification
methods.description: Add a notification message to the notifications list.
